forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 7C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High around 45F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 1C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 34F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 6C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 43F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low -1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 32F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny, along with a few afternoon clouds. High 8C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny, along with a few afternoon clouds. High 47F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 2C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 36F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 44F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low around 0C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 33F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 6C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
